name: Merge And Cast
description:
Merge And Cast is puzzle game about combining magic elements to create powerful spells. You start with only four basic elements, but you can create up to 35 elements by combining them at special slots. Final goal is to compete with other players in making most rated spell. There is an online leaderboard in game.

This game is made for ScoreSpace Jam #14 in 72 hours.

There was no 2D artist in our team, so UI is pretty much garbage, maybe we'll fix it in the future. Aspect ratio different from 16:9, 1920:1080 may break widgets and interaction.

Made by:

Frozen Light - Game Design, Sound

Liss1024 - Programming

Andriy Trak 3D modelling, concept art.
